rows.label: tlk45500152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
You there - you look like you have
some skills! Care to try your hand
working here?

rows.label: tlk45500152_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I see...that's a shame. I'm sure you
would've done a great job.

rows.label: tlk45500152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Skill is all that matters here -
we'll employ anyone as long as
they've got what it takes.

rows.label: tlk45500152_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I just wish Isset would give up on
that barely profitable junk shop of
his and work here instead...
